item.title: Amazon Kindle...friend...or foe...
item.description: There has been a lot of hype this week about Kindle - Amazon’s eBook reader. I have always regarded eBooks (also referred to as Digital Ink) as evil. They are almost always DRM (Digital Rights Management) protected so that you can’t share information with others and typically require an expensive eBook reader. On the other side, the idea of storing my book collection on a nice small aesthetic digital device seems attractive to me as a technophile.
